definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: The main part is made from expanded polytetrafluoroethylene.
sentences.chinese: 主要部分，是由膨体聚四氟乙烯。

sentences.english: New low friction, non-stick PTFE sole reduces strain on hand.
sentences.chinese: 新的低摩擦，非唯一聚四氟乙烯棒订单减少紧张。

sentences.english: Sorts of fluororesins and the discovery of polytetrafluoroethylene are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 简介氟树脂的种类和聚四氟乙烯的发现经过。

sentences.english: All awl tube thread pre-coated PTEF leakproof gum, with excellent sealing property.
sentences.chinese: 所有锥管螺纹预涂聚四氟乙烯防漏胶，密封性能好。

sentences.english: Traditionally, the steel pipe fittings with PTFE lining are mainly manufactured with the lap winding technique.
sentences.chinese: 内衬聚四氟乙烯管配件传统上主要采用缠绕法成型。

sentences.english: PVC construction with PTFE seat and FPM seals.
sentences.chinese: PVC结构，配置聚四氟乙烯阀座和FPM密封。

sentences.english: Use a hair dryer or heat gun to shrink the teflon tubing.
sentences.chinese: 使用吹风机或热风枪缩小聚四氟乙烯管材。

sentences.english: A detail review of pelletized polytetrafluoroethylene resins was carried out in present paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对聚四氟乙烯造粒料进行了较为详细的总结。

sentences.english: These might include the use of A-frames with TFE-coated slots and rubber coated rolls.
sentences.chinese: 这些个也许包孕了聚四氟乙烯涂层槽和橡皮辊的施用。

sentences.english: Polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) emulsion was used as die wall lubricant.
sentences.chinese: 模壁润滑采用聚四氟乙烯乳化液润滑。

sentences.english: Two kinds of PTFE pipes include molding and extruding pipes.
sentences.chinese: 聚四氟乙烯管材分为模压管和挤压管两种。

sentences.english: High impedance circuit construction, such as Teflon standoffs, must be used.
sentences.chinese: 必须使用诸如聚四氟乙烯支架等高阻抗结构。

sentences.english: The bearing shall be manufactured from PTFE- coated bronze centered on steel.
sentences.chinese: 轴承应该由聚四氟乙烯涂敷的中心为青铜的钢制造。

sentences.english: PTFE seats backed up with O-rings reduce the wear and tear of repeated cycling.
sentences.chinese: 聚四氟乙烯阀座备使O形圈减少磨损，反复循环。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
"super plastic" (term used to refer to Teflon)
